column4: hi all, is this channel suitable for not very experienced with debian or ubuntu? i have a problem but I can explain it from too high level
my wireless usb mouse works properly on the live ubuntu cd, but with warty doesnt
even if it is plugged during boot, the whole system freezes
I had problems with usb mouse during install, I put a ps/2 adaptor on it and then changed it after the installer had run
